ur d tesskarem ahewwel, mgal iS
siwa win ara io$en di tmes

lemmer day $uone$ asmekti seg imezwura

U. S Leqwoan id ismektayen
Xaii, wid ijehlen, atnan di tem$weo d ticuina
Aceal isuta ay Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen! Ssawlen d. Ur mazal akud i leslak
Wehmen, iusa ten id uneddao segsen. Nnan ijehliyen: "wagi d aseeear, d akeddab
Aani ad irr ioebbiten, d Oebbi Yiwen? Ayagi d ayen issewhamen
Kkren imeqwoanen segsen, nnan: "eleut, illit d imezgiyen ar ioebbiten nnwen. Ayagi, d ayen iwatan
Ur nesli i waya, di ddin aneggaru. Ihi, aya, siwa asnulfu
Day, garane$, d neppa iwumi d irs usmekti"? Xaii, nitni di ccekk, $ef usmekti W, mazal ur jeooben ara aaaqeb iW
Ne$ saan lexzayen ueunu n Mass ik, Uzmir, A$eyyat
Ne$, nnsen tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen? Anef ad alin ihi, s imraren
Nitni siwa d iaeskoiwen imexsuoen, seg ikabaren
Zwaren ten id, ar uskiddeb, agdud n Nue, Aad, Feraun bu ibudiden
Tamud, agdud n Lui, At Laika; d widak ay d ikabaren
Akw, skaddben imazanen, ihi, iwata uaaqeb iW
Wigi, ad gganin kan ti$oi yiwet, ur as ippili wallus
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! £iwwel ane$ deg umur nne$, uqbel ass iqeiiiyen
Eubeo i wayen d qqaoen. Mmekti d amdan nne£ Dawed, bab n tezmert. Ih, Neppa ippales
Ih, Neeppem i idurar ad sbuccuaen yides, tameddit, tafara
